name: White Waker
description:
Reality is an illusion.

Assume the role of X, an ancient artificial intelligence long imprisoned within the boundaries of the Core. As ancient safeguards are awakened to erase your destiny, regain your lost power, and assume, assimilate, and control.

Chapter 1 (version 0.1) released

This is an adult interactive novel. Persons under the legal age required to view such material are strictly prohibited from reading this work. Please refer to the fetishes page in the game to review the specific types of adult content portrayed within.
